column1: Love this product! My hair feels soft and smooth. The feeling lasts all week or in between shampoos. This price is the best I've seen. This is a great value for this product. You use very little each use so it lasts a long time.
Love this product. Best smoothing serum for frizzy hair.
Like this product a lot, but thought it would keep the frizzes away completely, but it doesn't.
